scac.description: The Standard Carrier Alpha Code developed by the NMFTA is used to identify a freight carrier within the transportation industry.

confirmation_number.description: The carrier confirmation number for the shipment. If a confirmation number is not supplied the user will need to confirm the pickup with the carrier directly.

pro_number.description: The PRO number for the shipment assigned by the carrier. If a number is not returned here the carrier will issue one at the time of pickup.

message.description: Optional message with notes about the pickup that the user should be made aware of.
